income_messages:
From: r****************4@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-28 15:24:48
SUBJECT:   Greetings
  Greetings
How are you doing?
After waiting to hear from you and your partners for a long time now, I decided to make this direct approach to you as my new resolution in order not to let it be as if I have anything in mind  against you. I do not know if you have asked yourself why each time the approval of this fund is released, all of a sudden, the payment will be stopped, and one problem or the other  will come up. If you have not asked yourself this question, this is an opportunity for me to tell you.
Some time ago, your partners, I mean the people that introduced you to the business, they approached me through my wife who works with the HM Treasury, a Government's Economic and Finance Ministry and requested me to assist them conclude a money transfer deal they had with you. They asked me to assist them by removing the original contractor's details from the database and replacing it with your details to make you appear as the rightful beneficiary of this fund.
I agreed to do it on condition that they will pay me GBP£80,000.00 as soon as your name appears as the beneficiary. I did as we agreed and demanded to be paid, but your friends started telling me stories, they even told me that you are the one that promised to send money to me, and up till now, I have not received a single cent from them and have not set my eyes on any of them?  Based on their attitude, I decided to  stop the fund release process because I cannot be denied my right in my own office considering the risk as it might affect my job..  Secondly, I know the source of the funds that you did not execute any contract or inherit any claim, although I am the only person privileged to know this information and it is a fact. Why I am making this clear to you is that I can see that you are still making efforts in order to conclude this money transfer deal.
Now I am ready to forget the past, I do not need the GBP£80.000.00 any longer from you but a good compensation from your mind. I need your assurance that those colleagues will be totally kept out of this transaction. I know that none of them are aware of my new approach to you. Stop spending your money unnecessarily to any of those Officers both here and overseas because you will not receive this money without my hand in it. I personally did the work at the beginning and only I can diligently complete the pending funds.
Finally, I need your promise that no official of those Banks you have contacted before will be aware of my involvement in this regard because of my position. Now re-assure me that you will be willing to compensate me and that you will assist my wife to establish a foreign account in your country where my compensation will be lodged.
I am a man of my word. If you are ready to conclude this business with me, kindly contact me so that we can have a chat over this issue once and for all. But if the reverse is the case, do not bother yourself to reach me and forget about this money.
BEST REGARDS
Richard Meddings,
Financial Unit Programme Officer    
From: r****************4@gmail.com
To: xa96969@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-28 20:36:17
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings
Dear Teri
In response to your email, I am willing to do what I stated in my mail to
you.
Well let me tell you, I am a man of honor, God fearing and respect for
human dignity. I have never disappointed anybody before in my chosen
career. I am really sure of what I will do to get this fund approved in
your name,I will send my report to the United Nation/IMF funds
reconciliation Unit to raise an irrevocable payment approval on this fund.
I would like you to update me with your current details, including your
banking details and mailing address to enable me start the process. I can
assure you that you shall never be disappointed about doing this
transaction anymore. So,If you are ready to complete this transaction with
me, you must have to be focused and serious with me.
I quite believe that what should matter between us is just a matter of
understanding about the compensation and also assisting my wife to
establish a foreign account in your country where my compensation will be
lodged.
I Wait for your quick response.
Richard Meddings
Financial Unit Programme Officer
From: r****************4@gmail.com
To: xa96969@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-30 13:49:40
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings
Hello Teri,
I am 100% convinced that my previous letter did clearly state the reason
why you were contacted, but with regard to your response. I am not sure if
you actually understood the content of the previous letter clearly.
I was appointed as Funds Recovery Database Officer at the United Nation/IMF
funds reconciliation Unit,also UK Financial Investigation Unit Programme
Officer.
What I was telling you is about your £18.5million GBP, which your British
partners approached me through my wife who works with the HM Treasury, a
Government's Economic and Finance Ministry and requested me to assist them
conclude a money transfer deal they had with you. They asked me to assist
them by removing the original details from the database and replacing it
with your details to make you appear as the rightful beneficiary of this
fund.
I agreed to do it on the condition that they will pay me GBP£80,000.00 as
soon as your name appears as the beneficiary. But your british friends
started telling me stories that you as the beneficiary is the one to pay
the money to me, Based on their attitude, I decided to stop the fund
release process by United Nation/IMF funds reconciliation Unit because I
cannot be denied my right in my own office considering the risk as it might
affect my job.
For your information,your current details needs to be updated to enable me
start the process, you have to feel comfortable sharing the details, while
i will used my Database codes to remove the hold off the £18.5million GBP
and transmitted the signal to Swissquote Bank so that the Funds will be
approved by the United Nation/IMF funds reconciliation Unit to be paid to
you.
It takes an association over a time span, where actions speak louder than
words, by saying what you mean, mean what you say and confirm by doing all
you say and mean! Honesty can only be proven when you can't dispel it! My
contentions to all this RHETORIC, this particular transaction has nothing
to do with illegitimate, and I don't get involved in frivolities and
illegitimate transactions, my word is my bond.
Please you must acknowledge me under compensation of 25% of this said total
fund £18.5million GBP, because I want to do this with my good heart.
I await your response
Richard Meddings
Financial Unit Programme Officer
outbound_messages:
From: xa96969@l******s.email
To: r****************4@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-28 15:25:00
SUBJECT: Re:   Greetings
Hello Richard,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to share this information with me. I understand your concerns and I assure you that I am willing to work with you to ensure that this money transfer deal is concluded successfully.
I am sorry to hear that your colleagues did not keep their promise to you. I can assure you that I will keep them out of this and will not contact any of the banks that I have previously contacted. I am willing to compensate you for your assistance and help your wife establish a foreign account in my country.
Can you please provide me with more details on how we can proceed with this deal? I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Teri
From: xa96969@l******s.email
To: r****************4@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-28 21:24:16
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings
Dear Richard,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate your willingness to assist me with the fund approval process. However, I am not comfortable sharing my personal banking details and mailing address at this time. Can you please provide me with more information about the process and how it works? I would also like to know more about your background and experience in this field.
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Teri
